result.title: cycle length
result.content:
consider the following algorithm 1- input n 2- print n 3- if n==1 then stop 4- if n is odd then 3*n+1 5- else n=n/2 6- goto 2 Given n=22 the following sequence of numbers will be printed 22 11 34 17 52 26 13 40 20 10 5 16 8 4 2 1 for a given n this is called the cycle-length of n , in the example above , the cycle length of 22 is 16 Now you are required to print the n with the maximum cycle length in a given range . so you will be given 2 numbers a and b which is the range you are going to find n with the max cycle length in it . for example if a=1 and b=10,so you have to find which number between 1 and 10 has the max cycle length which is 9 as it will reach 1 after20 iterations (cycles). finally,for given a and b,print the max cycle length. limits for n (1<=n<=1000) Example Input 1 10 Output maximum cycle length = 20

Input 100 200 Output maximum cycle length = 125

Input 201 210 Output maximum cycle length = 89

Input 900 1000 Output maximum cycle length = 174
